SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Attributable
Containts useful getters for preestablished attributes of the most important objects within the proyect.
Cart
Controls the product desired for purchase by a User.
GZDBActions
Contains different exclusive SQL keywords used for setting up SQL statements, however it is exclusively used for SQL Actions and Queries, this garuantees a correct and precise usage of the SQL syntax.
GZDBConnector
Provides methods for connecting to a MySQL database, performing various CRUD operations, and retrieving table information.
GZDBExceptionMessages
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when performing SQL Actions and Queries, including the creation, filling and execution of statements.
GZDBExecutor
Creates, prepares, fills and executes SQL Statements depending on the given input.
GZDBReserved
Contains different exclusive SQL keywords used for setting up SQL statements, like actions and queries, this garuantees a correct and precise usage of the SQL syntax, for the most prominent usage @see GZDBExecutor
GZDBResultException
Custom exception that handles faulty input maps, faulty SQL executions and and the inclusion of custom and specific exception messages for a better control.
GZDBSuperManager
Establishes a connection with the database and obtains the different field names and data types of a specific table.
GZDBTables
Contains the different SQL Table names used within the Green Zenith proyect, this garuantees a correct and precise usage of the SQL syntax.
GZFormats
Contains regular expressions that establish a certain format and rules to follow when filling a determined value, so it guarantees a correct compatibility with the Database, for the recommended usage @see GZFormatter
GZFormatter
Aids in making comparisons with certain established and predefined formats, and a specific input value, providing a concise and decisive result that determines if a pattern of a regular expression is met or not.
Interactable
Containts useful getters for preestablished attributes of objects that can be interacted with to establish certain properties.
InvalidMessageException
Custom exception class to indicate a failure that happened with an interaction made by different users using messages.
InvalidPlantException
Custom exception class to indicate a failure that happened with an interaction made by a User and it's plants.
InvalidProductException
Custom exception class to indicate a failure that happened with an interaction made by a User with it's owned products and cart.
InvalidUserException
Custom exception class to indicate a failure that happened with an interaction made by a User.
Killable
Containts methods for stopping certain objects and deleting them from the database.
Location
Handles the usage of location data.
Message
Manages the delivery and receival of messages.
MessageExceptions
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when caused by an interaction of Users.
PictureHandler
Handles the internal control and transformations of different image files.
Plant
Represents a plant or plant set owned by a User, with it's respective attributes, allowing the creation, modification and deletion of it.
PlantConfirmations
Contains predefined confirmation messages to indicate if a certain action regarding a plant was executed successfully.
PlantExceptions
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when caused by an interaction of the User with it's plants.
PlantList
Provides a list that contains all the different plants that a user posseses.
Product
Represents a product owned by a User, with it's respective attributes and parent plant for sale, allowing the creation, modification and deletion of it.
ProductExceptions
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when caused by an interaction of the User with it's products and cart.
ProductList
Handles the different products a User has for sale.
User
Represents a User of the application, with it's respective attributes, allowing the creation, modification and deletion of it, as well as being the central piece of interaction of the entire application, allowing for access and control od the plants, products and cart.
UserConfirmations
Contains predefined confirmation messages to indicate if a certain regarding a user action was executed successfully.
UserExceptions
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when caused by an interaction of the User.
